content:
• Manage Distribution List
ID: 8451-789-ok
Description: This intent refers to the  request of adding/Removing people (either users or owners/admins) to/from group distribution list (DL), mailing list, listserv, shared mailbox, mail group, mail alias, Microsoft Office 365 group, etc. Request to create or delete DL, etc.
Entities: [{ "dl_name": "name_of_distibution_list", "contact": "first.name_last.name",  "email": "email_address"}]

	• Camera Issues
ID: 5499-745-hj
Description: This intent refers to help needed with the configuration or setup of the laptop camera or user is having issues with their camera or webcam during meetings.
Entities: [{ "laptop_brand": "name of the device brand", "screen_size": "screen size in inches",  "issue_detals": "description of the issue" }]

	• Performance Inquiry
ID: 3651-765-yh
Description: This intent refers to any inquiries or concerns regarding the performance management system, PMD, SMART goals, goals, performance and development plans.
Entities: []

	• Hardware Request
ID: 3475-754-hg
Description: This intent refers to  request for a specific hardware
Entities: [{ "Hardware_brand": "manufacturer_name", "Hardware_model": "specific version or configuration of a physical device", "possible_values": [ "mouse", "cable", "laptop", "phone", "motherboard", "USB", "keyboards", "monitor", "printer", "scanner", "headphones"]}]

You are provided with the list of intents.    
Each intent has its unique ID in alphanumerical format and description.  Some entities have slot names and value descriptions.
It may also include a field possibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values.  It could also include a field exampleValues where examples are given but the extracted slots do not need to exactly match those given values. Important: If multiple entities present, fill all the slots. If no value present for the slot, return "none" for this value.
Identify the intent of the input sentence and extract the relevant entities for the intent.
If no intent matches the utterance, return the response as {"intents":[{"id:"no_intent", "entities":{}}]}
You must respond in JSON format with the identified intent and extracted entities. Here is the format for your response: {"output":[{"id:"<matching id>", "entities":{"entity name":"value", ...}}]}


**Sentence**
I kindly request the procurement of an ASUS ROG Strix Z690-E WIFI 6E ATX LGA1700 DDR5 Motherboard by 24.07.21. I think it fits the budget limit as the price is 275$.
